AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: logger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] chopped trees and hauled their lumber back to the tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] wielded [PAWN_possessive] axe with the finesse of an artist and the force of a charging muffalo.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: gatherer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Using [PAWN_possessive] knowledge of plants, roots, and berries, [PAWN_nameDef] could find food in even the most barren landscapes. [PAWN_pronoun] stayed away from animals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: loner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] never much liked the tribal council or the yearly festivals. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred the open plain and the whistle of wind through the rocks. \n[PAWN_pronoun] visited [PAWN_possessive] tribe from time to time, but mostly took care of [PAWN_objective]self using [PAWN_possessive] own survival skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: banished
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe banished [PAWN_objective] following a bloody dispute. [PAWN_pronoun] survived in the wilds alone for a long time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: treehouse builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] built houses among, and sometimes suspended in, the trees for [PAWN_possessive] people to use while traveling or foraging. [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to best find and use wild plants, and how to fight off wild animals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: plank cutter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] helped [PAWN_possessive] tribe build huge wooden structures by cutting trees into sturdy planks. [PAWN_nameDef] developed a fine understanding of how wood grows and splits.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: framer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for erecting structures for [PAWN_possessive] fellow tribespeople to live in. This included both temporary structures for nomadic travel, and permanent settlements. Gathering building materials from local plant life was part of the job.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bricklayer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was responsible for erecting structures of stone for [PAWN_possessive] fellow tribespeople. Strong foundations and walls, altars and temples during construction required {PAWN_nameDef} to make some calculations and adjust the shape of stone bricks.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: digger
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] labored in mines and caves, digging out spaces for storing items and hiding from threats. [PAWN_possessive] work provided hiding spots for [PAWN_possessive] friends on many occasions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: butcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s main job in the hunting party was the butchering of animals. [PAWN_pronoun] became a master with the knife, able to extract every bit of value from a carcass in a short time.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hearth tender
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: While the others were out hunting and foraging, [PAWN_nameDef] would stay at home to cook and take care of the young and sick.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: stew keeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] prepared meals from the plants and animals brought in by gatherers, farmers, and hunters of [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] had to make sure it was calorie-efficient, long-lasting, and healthy. [PAWN_pronoun] often processed and sometime gathered plants [PAWN_objective]self.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: tamer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s role in [PAWN_possessive] tribe was to connect with the natural world around - especially the world of animals. In addition to fulfilling a spiritual role, [PAWN_pronoun] also tamed wild beasts and cared for them as they served the tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: herder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] herded a variety of animals to help feed and clothe [PAWN_possessive] tribe while on the move. [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to calm and direct the beasts, and how to hunt [PAWN_possessive] own meals on the trail.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: weaver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert at working wool, plant fibers and natural dyes into beautiful clothing for [PAWN_possessive] kin. [PAWN_possessive] handicrafts were traded frequently with other settlements.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: blacksmith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As a smith, [PAWN_nameDef] gained a reputation for the high quality of [PAWN_possessive] work. [PAWN_pronoun] wasn't bad at using the swords [PAWN_pronoun] forged either.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: healer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: After [PAWN_possessive] tribe's elder healer was killed in a raid, [PAWN_nameDef] took on the role. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] days scrounging up herbs and mineral compounds from the nearby area to use in surprisingly effective remedies.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: carver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] carved artworks for [PAWN_possessive] tribe from wood, stone, and occasionally, more exotic materials. The work was sometimes sold, and sometimes kept to beautify settlements and provide a focus for rituals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lore keeper
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of a long line of lore keepers in [PAWN_possessive] tribe. Every night around the fire, [PAWN_pronoun] would pass on ancient knowledge and helpful wisdom through stories.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: malingerer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] often feigned sickness in order to avoid [PAWN_possessive] responsibilities. While resting in the sick hut, [PAWN_pronoun] told stories to the children.
